attributes.additional_details: Royal Blood possibly the worst thing to happen to this country for a while have invaded our radio stations, festivals, album charts while the good people of this country are sitting around doing nothing. The time for action is now. We need to elminate them and whoever stands in our way. The only viable option is for Royal Blood to be deported as murder is not currently legal over here. Royal Blood's album has been reported to induce innnocent civilians with life threatening diseases as they have inundated our airwaves with disguised reguritated recycled pop-metal in what can only be described as a corporate scam.
